Title: Prohibits candidates from pre-marking contribution materials to ensure recurring payments
Summary: Prohibits candidates from soliciting contributions or donations from any contributor or donor using any material or medium pre-marking that such voter shall make a recurring contribution or donation to such candidate; provides that any candidate who does so may be liable for treble damages.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting candidates from pre-marking contribution materials to ensure recurring payments
